message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SCREEN_EFFECTIVE_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The effective date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SCREEN_PRODUCT_START_DATE
message.locale: The effective date must not be earlier than the product start date.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SCREEN_PRODUCT_END_DATE
message.locale: The effective date must not be later than the product end date.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SCREEN_PAGE_IDENTIFIER_EMPTY
message.locale: The page name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SCREEN_PAGE_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The page type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SCREEN_EVIDENCE_LEVEL_EMPTY
message.locale: The evidence level must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SCREEN_EVIDENCE_NODE_EMPTY
message.locale: The evidence node must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SCREEN_OVERLAP
message.locale: The evidence screen overlaps with an existing evidence screen record.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_SCREEN_PAGE_IDENTIFIER_INCORRECT_FORMAT
message.locale: The page name should not contain spaces.
